description.author: Salesforce
text: A component that displays a list of Copilot topics with an optional guidance component. It allows interaction such as editing, viewing details, and removing topics from a Copilot version. The list can be displayed in a condensed or expanded format based on the `expanded` property.

elements.name: copilotTopicsList
elements.description: Represents the list of Copilot topics.

elements.name: topicRowActions
elements.description: Represents the action buttons for each topic row.
